items.text: uses the depth of the crease well to flick a good length ball on middle behind square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: keeps low and Hope just about manages to make contact. Lucky the line of the ball was way outside off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, Hope works it through midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText:
Only three bowlers used so far. Here's the fourth, Mustafizur Rahman. Left-arm over to Hope.

Hello, hello. Al has gone off for a well-deserved break. I don't think either team will be too unhappy with how things have gone so far.
items.text: length ball on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller, angling away from off stump. A little late getting forward to push into the off side, ends up playing it off the inside half of the bat through square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length, angling across to off stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: overpitched, a fair amount of width too, leans into a drive to the right of the sweeper at deep cover point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: length ball slanting away from off stump, punched to extra-cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, worked away to the right of deep square leg, nicely placed
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.preText: Another change, here's Shakib Al Hasan, left-arm round to Chase.
items.text: length ball, skids on with the angle towards middle stump, blocked back down the pitch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: back of a length, again goes with the angle towards off stump, punched into the covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: goes back to a length ball on middle stump, punched to straight midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: down the track now to one with a bit more flight on off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: goes back to a length ball sliding on towards off stump, punched into the point region
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: full now, a bit more flight on off stump, defended firmly back to the bowler, an excellent start from Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: gone, West Indies are three down! Not the most wicket-taking of deliveries, back of a length and angling across to off stump. Looks to play a forcing back-foot flick, and plays a little early and ends up popping a simple catch to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, OUT

dismissal.text: RL Chase c Mahmudullah b Mustafizur Rahman 19 (36m 29b 2x4 0x6) SR: 65.51

items.preText: Jonathan Carter walks in at No. 5. Good mix of right- and left-hand batsmen through this line-up. Mustafizur continues from over the wicket.
items.text: back of a length, nips in from outside off to cramp Carter a little as he tries to dab down to third man. Can only play a defensive jab in the end
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Carter, no run

items.text: ooh, well bowled. A bit of extra bounce, and too close to cut anyway, the outside edge is beaten
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Carter, no run

items.text: full, a bit of swing in towards off stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Carter, no run

items.preText:
A wide-ish gully in place for Carter.

Hasib Zubayer: "Masrafee is far away as strike bowler. No pace or swing at all. He should be in the team as mantor. My best 11 for world Cup 1. Tamim 2.Shomoya 3. Shakib(c) 4.Mushfiq 5. Mithun 6.Mahmudullah 7. Sabbir 8. Saifuddin 9.Mehedy 10. Mustafiz 11. Rubel " -- Quite a bold call that would be.
items.text: back of a length, once again some late inward movement to cramp Carter, jabbed down towards the fielder at gully
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Carter, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, punched firmly back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Carter, no run

items.text: tossed up full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: again it's nice and full, and again Hope drives it firmly back where it came from
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: flat, sliding on down the leg side. Looks to open up and work it into the leg side but it skids through too quick and hits him on the pad. Nearly rolls between his legs and onto the stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, punched down to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run
